about.title: Košice Fencing Guild
about.content: At KŠC, we are dedicated to practicing martial traditions of medieval and Renaissance Europe. We train with longswords, sabres, and more — focusing on skill, athletic performance, history, and community. Whether you're a beginner or experienced fencer, you'll find a welcoming place to learn and grow here.

content1.paragraph: HEMA, or Historical European Martial Arts, is the modern revival of Europe's forgotten fighting traditions. It's based on historical manuals and brings centuries-old martial traditions back to life through training and sparring

content2.paragraph: Unlike choreographed swordfighting you see in movies or historical events, HEMA is a martial art. Every move is rooted in historical sources and tested against a resisting partner. It's not about performing — it's about understanding how real swordplay works

content3.paragraph: The duels we study were fought in ordinary clothes, not armor, and our gear needs to reflect that. HEMA uses modern protective elements made from puncture-resistant fabrics and durable plastics. It's inspired by history but designed for safety, comfort, and mobility

content4.paragraph: HEMA offers the full package of a martial art. We train strength, endurance, coordination, and awareness — but also the mindset to push through the limits. Confidence, skill, and friendships are forged through the shared challenge of mastering this complex but rewarding discipline

content: KŠC began as a small group of enthusiasts lead by Slavomír Hubatka back in 2016, training simply out of passion for historical fencing. Like many clubs, we went quiet during the pandemic — but in 2023 we came back stronger, forming an official organization and opening our doors to new members.

Now, with experienced instructors like Filip 'Joxer' Trcka and a growing community, we're writing the next chapter of our story together. While we're still young in the tournament scene, one of our founding members and head instructor Miroslav Medviď ranks among the world's top HEMA fencers — a reminder of how far dedication can go.

join.content: We are actively recruiting new members of all skill levels. Groups of beginners are usually formed once or twice a year, so don't hesitate to reach out and express your interest. Training sessions are held couple of times a week, and we provide all the necessary equipment for beginners to get started safely. Whether you're looking to compete or just want to learn a new skill, we are here to provide supportive environment for you as a fencer.

swordAndBuckler.name: Sword and Buckler
swordAndBuckler.description: A classic medieval combination offering both offense and defense. The buckler provides excellent protection while maintaining mobility and aggressive fighting style.

longsword.name: Longsword
longsword.description: The quintessential weapon of HEMA. Versatile and elegant, the longsword can be used for cutting, thrusting, and leverage techniques with both hands.

sabre.name: Military Sabre
sabre.description: Fast and dynamic cavalry weapon. Emphasizes swift cutting attacks and aggressive footwork, representing the martial traditions of Eastern European cavalry.

rapier.name: Rapier
rapier.description: The gentleman's dueling weapon of the Renaissance. Focused on precise thrusting techniques, footwork, and sophisticated blade control in civilian combat.
